name: nativescript-ratings
description: Prompt users to rate the Telerik NativeScript application

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns emulate android
scripts.run.android: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin remove nativescript-ratings; tns plugin add ..; tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo; npm install; cd ..; npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin add ..; cd ..

author: Nic Raboy
